name: Turbo
desc:
Turbo is an independent design studio/space based in Amman, Jordan run by Saeed Abu-Jaber &Mothanna Hussein.

Turbo provided the designs for the website and asked me to implement them on top of a simple backend. The website was built on top of KeystoneJS and the designs were ammended to make them adapt to different screen sizes.
